import React, { useState, useContext, useRef } from 'react'; import { ThemeContext } from './ThemeProvider'; import { useHotkeys } from 'react-hotkeys-hook'; import { DarkModeSwitch } from 'react-toggle-dark-mode'; // import logo from '../image/logoipsum-logo-35.svg'; export default function Navbar({ user }) { const { darkMode, toggleDarkMode } = useContext(ThemeContext); const inputRef = useRef(); // Switch theme useHotkeys( 'cmd+/, ctrl+/', () => { toggleDarkMode(); }, [toggleDarkMode] ); // Focus search box useHotkeys( '/', () => { console.log("'/' pressed! Focusing search box..."); inputRef.current.focus(); }, [inputRef] ); return (
